channel.title: A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.

item.title: Rahul Krishna
item.description: I’m a Sofware Engineer in the Bay Area. I enjoy developing code, learning about technology and in general, tinkering At various points in my career, I’ve worked in engineering management, and enjoyed that side of the enterprise software development as well, scaling teams, working across departments etc. Why Blog? I’ve kept notes of things I do and learn on a regular basis, but I never thought putting it down in a blog will give me a graeter accountability fo doing a thorough job about it.

item.title: What Lorem Ipsum
item.description: I don’t know what Lorem Ipsum is, but I can try to type something up that’ll fill these pages. The only reason I’m doing it is to check if this is going to be formatted the same was as the other pages that I typed in, as opposed just copy/paste.

item.title: Why Lorem Ipsum
item.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using ‘Content here, content here’, making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for ‘lorem ipsum’ will uncover many web sites still in their infancy.
